## Instructions

This interface was developed all in R using mainly the shiny and rtweet packages. The tool is online on shinyapps' repository at the adress <https://adsoncostanzi.shinyapps.io/TextMining/>.

PS: To run this app localy it is necessary to have Twitter autorization (access_token, access_secret, api_key, api_secret).
If you do not have this autorization yet use the comand `rtweet::vignette("auth")`.
